version_description: Bug squashing party!
Bug squashing party!

Presence cameras are now accessible from most major web browsers! Sign in at http://presencepro.com to control and view your Presence cameras live from your desk. Nearly 13,000 people voted this feature up the priority list!  We love it.

Presence cameras are now accessible from most major web browsers! Sign in at http://presencepro.com to control and view your Presence cameras live from your desk. Nearly 13,000 people voted this feature up the priority list!  We love it.

Presence 4.0 delivers a beautiful new user experience and tons of killer new features!

NEW FREE FEATURES!
- New navigation: The new navigation and design of the Presence app has a beautiful and modern look-and-feel. The smooth slide-out navigation menu is designed to massively expand the capabilities of Presence. Inside, you'll find a simple Presence landing screen designed to highlight new information and quickly navigate you to other important areas of the app.

- Friends and sharing:  Get help watching your home while you're out!  Invite your trusted circle of family and friends to receive alerts from selected Presence cameras and Presence Security sensors, while you're on vacation or simply away from home.  This is the future of home security.

- Presence Security Packs: Powerful wireless home sensors connect straight to your Presence account, including door/window entry sensors, motion detectors, touch sensors, water sensors, humidity sensors, and temperature sensors. Your home will notify you and your trusted circle when something important happens.  Find out more at http://presencepro.com.

- New modes: In addition to Home and Away, Presence now features Sleep and Vacation modes, enabling you to customize and control the behavior of all your Presence devices or start sharing alerts with the push of a button.

- Recover deleted files: Every deleted file is now saved for 2 weeks and can be easily recovered.  No need to worry about accidentally deleting your video evidence!


NEW PRO FEATURES!
- Sound an alarm!  Everyone can try this Pro feature for a limited time for free!  Secure your cameras and notify your surrounding neighbor in the case of an intrusion by blasting an alarm and requiring your password to disable it. Or simply make your Presence camera to beep once when the door opens, and know when someone is coming and going.

Tell your friends. Presence 4.0 has arrived.

NEW FREE FEATURES!
+ Better support and reliability for Presence Cameras, including iOS 7 cameras
+ New ways to "Add Devices"
+ Scenarios will instantly create all the rules for your Presence Security devices when you select a new installation scenario!

Be sure to check out our YouTube channel for all the latest tips and tricks!

NEW FREE FEATURES!
+ Better support and reliability for Presence Cameras, including iOS 7 cameras
+ New ways to "Add Devices"
+ Scenarios will instantly create all the rules for your Presence Security devices when you select a new installation scenario!

Be sure to check out our YouTube channel for all the latest tips and tricks!

NEW FREE FEATURES!
+ Geofencing - Automatically set your mode to Home or Away using GPS Location Services
+ 3D Touch: Quick Actions - Quickly navigate to your Modes, Cameras & Devices or Videos & Pictures straight from the Home Screen. (iPhone 6S and 6S Plus)

BUG SMASHING PARTY!
+ Improved camera and viewer reliability.

+ Presence 360

+ Presence 360
+ Presence Camera Options
+ Bug fixes

+ Presence 360
- New Rule: "If my 'Front Door Camera' detects motion, then make my 'Presence 360 Camera' point to my 'Front Door' vantage point."
- New Feature: Invert up/down movement remotely
- New Feature: True North Calibration - Use compass technology to always keep your camera pointing in the right direction

+ Dynamically update storage capacity indicator when recovering deleted files.

+ Bug Fixes

+ Presence 360
- New Rule: "If my 'Front Door Camera' detects motion, then make my 'Presence 360 Camera' point to my 'Front Door' vantage point."
- New Feature: Invert up/down movement remotely
- New Feature: True North Calibration - Use compass technology to always keep your camera pointing in the right direction

+ Dynamically update storage capacity indicator when recovering deleted files.

+ Bug Fixes

+ Presence 360
- New Feature: While viewing a Presence 360 Camera remotely you can now manually move your robot to an existing Vantage Point.
- Improvement: Fix some timing issues around automatically moving through vantage points

+ New Feature: Offline Video Recording
- In the event your camera loses network connectivity it will still record new motion detection videos, uploading these new recordings when it regains connection to the internet.
- Up to 100 MBs offline storage

+ Bug Fixes

+ Presence 360
- New Feature: While viewing a Presence 360 Camera remotely you can now manually move your robot to an existing Vantage Point.
- Improvement: Fix some timing issues around automatically moving through vantage points

+ New Feature: Offline Video Recording
- In the event your camera loses network connectivity it will still record new motion detection videos, uploading these new recordings when it regains connection to the internet.
- Up to 100 MBs offline storage

+ Bug Fixes

+ New Features
- Over-the-air firmware updates for Presence 360 Robots (iOS 10 or newer)
- German localization
- iOS 11 support

+ Improvements
- P360 Usability
- Camera Stability
- Geofencing Usability
- Smart Plug UI bug fixes

+ New Features
- Over-the-air firmware updates for Presence 360 Robots (iOS 10 or newer)
- German localization
- iOS 11 support

+ Improvements
- P360 Usability
- Camera Stability
- Geofencing Usability
- Smart Plug UI bug fixes

Bug Fixes:
- Presence 360 recognized after pairing
- Various device triggers included in rule editor
- Rule count on landing page made accurate
- Easier access to sidebar button
- Able to save videos with iOS 11
 
New Features:
- Multi-phone geofencing
- iPhone X compatibility
- Preloaded device interfaces
 
Noteworthy:
- Updated geofencing for iOS 10 and 11
- Updated custom rule editor interface
- Updated in app purchase interface
- Improved load performance of FAQ content
- Custom rules can engage devices multiple times
- Default camera motion sensitivity set to "normal"
- Number of connected devices shown when pairing
